title: South Korea Halloween Deaths Were ‘Absolutely Avoidable’ Disaster, Experts Say
description: Days after the deaths of more than 150 young people, officials were still struggling to explain what exactly went wrong and who was to blame.
dc:creator: Choe Sang-Hun
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: Mourners on Monday gathered at a makeshift memorial to the victims of a crowd crush in Seoul on Saturday night.
